column1: Tolman "Tom" Gardner was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Tom was the thirteenth and youngest child of Samwise Gamgee and Rose Cotton. He was named after his mothers brother Tolman Cotton Junior.
Tolman comes from Old English t≈çl + mann meaning "tool person".Jim Allan
column3: "Giving of Names" In early phases of writing Appendix F
column4: it was a translation of original Westron Tomacca or (earlier) Tomakli.
